summary: Contoso Wireless offers several payment options, including major credit cards, PayPal, and their own Contoso Wireless Card. The Contoso Wireless Card is a prepaid card that can be used for purchases at any of their stores or online. Customers who use the Contoso Wireless Card also receive a 10% discount on all products. Contoso Wireless has a wide selection of phones, including iPhones, Samsungs, and Motorola devices, as well as accessories such as cases and chargers. Detailed information about each phone model is available on their website, and customers can also speak with an expert in store for further assistance.
